title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Augmented Reality-Enhanced Advanced History and Geography Learning Program for Secondary Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Through AR simulation, students can explain three or more historical events within spatial and temporal contexts.
By engaging in augmented reality geography exploration activities, students can comparatively analyze five or more topographical features.
Students can complete one project that solves history and geography problems using digital collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
